languages.text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: До конца боя атаки архмилитанта не обнуляют запас {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Кроме того, каждая атака дает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} 5% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Veteran's attacks don't spend all movement points. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% bonus to dodge for 1 round.
Until the end of combat, the Veteran's attacks don't spend all MP. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% bonus to dodge for 1 round.

Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 首席战士的攻击不再会消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此外，每次攻击都会使{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高5%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 首席战士的攻击不再会消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此外，每次攻击都会使{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高5%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, los ataques del Archimilitante no consumen todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Además, cada ataque proporciona una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulable del 5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, los ataques del Archimilitante no consumen todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Además, cada ataque proporciona una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulable del 5 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘終了時まで、アーク・ミリタントの攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費しない。また、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、攻撃を繰り出すたびに{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}（スタック可）が付与される。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了時まで、アーク・ミリタントの攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費しない。また、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、攻撃を繰り出すたびに{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}（スタック可）が付与される。

languages.text: До конца боя атаки архмилитанта не обнуляют запас {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Кроме того, каждая атака дает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} 5% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя атаки ветерана не обнуляют запас {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Кроме того, каждая атака дает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} 5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

До конца боя атаки ветерана не обнуляют запас {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Кроме того, каждая атака дает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} 5% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verbrauchen die Angriffe des Erzmilitanten nicht alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Darüber hinaus gewährt jeder Angriff für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, der gestacked werden kann.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verbrauchen die Angriffe des Erzmilitanten nicht alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Darüber hinaus gewährt jeder Angriff für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'archimilitant peut attaquer sans perdre tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Par ailleurs, chaque attaque lui confère un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de +5 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Vétéran peut attaquer sans perdre tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Par ailleurs, chaque attaque lui confère un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de +5 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Çatışma sonuna dek Başmilitan'ın saldırıları, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'yi harcamaz. Ayrıca her saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerine 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırır. Bu bonus, üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant's attacks do not spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Additionally, each attack grants a stacking +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
